Interface ThermostatControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device, ZigBeeEndpoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThermostatControlDevice

    public interface ThermostatControl
extends Device

    ZigBee Cluster Library public release version 075123r01ZB
